name: Stowe Craft Gallery
tag_list: handmade, made-in-america, vermont, pottery, blown-glass, pewter, artisan, art, home-decor, artwork, artists, retail, art-glass, handmade-furniture-
overview:
Stowe Craft Gallery is a leading Vermont and online source for handmade, artisan jewelry, furniture, home decor, art and crafts.

The gallery features selected work from over 300 artisans based in their own studios in Vermont and all over the USA. Visitors will find broad selection including jewelry, home decor, furniture, wall art, glassware, kitchen accessories and gifts.

Stowe Craft Gallery is a long established, brick and mortar store as well as being online. It is open year ‘round in Stowe Village, Vermont, down by the Little River, across from the covered walking bridge at the start of the Mountain Road.
